title: Тайна города М.
overview: Mila Koroleva decides to leave the capital and go to a small provincial town to start a new life there. But will she be able to get rid of the secret pursuer following on her heels? Moreover, he is already ready to move from threats to action. Ksenia Koroleva, having learned about the danger looming over her daughter, comes to her to help find the criminal and protect Mila.
